meanings.definition: Having the ability, fitness, or quality necessary to do or achieve a specified thing.
meanings.sent1: She is the capablest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: He proved to be the capablest candidate for the job.
meanings.sent3: The capablest chef in town burned the toast today.
meanings.sent4: Her capablest efforts shone through in the final project.
meanings.sent5: The capablest swimmer effortlessly glided through the water.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to do something well.
meanings.sent1: The capablest musician played a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: She is the capablest artist in our group.
meanings.sent3: The capablest juggler dropped all the balls at once.
meanings.sent4: His capablest moves on the dance floor amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The capablest driver navigated the winding roads with ease.
